short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Improves appearance of the St Andrews student resources platform, featuring a completely redesigned UI and UX.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
- Dark mode
- Download files and folders without leaving the website
- Smooth navigation
- Pin links to modules
- Find viewed files with search
- Organize related files with tags
- Code syntax highlighting

Fully open source: https://github.com/Herobread/better-studres-v2
